content: {A抱歉}Sorry, but my ears tell me they prefer being "on the road." There are so many interesting sounds to hear out there. Still, thank you for the invitation.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Ahem, if I understand correctly...{A歪头} What you're saying is... I can have a piece of your territory to call my own?
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Though my dream is to set foot on all the lands... your suggestion isn't bad at all! "A place to return to," I like that destination!
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A加油}I'll have to trouble you again to help ask the staff at <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> to help arrange everything. Once the housing is sorted out, I'll move in, kula bata!
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: I've got my bags all packed and ready! But wait... It seems like you haven't marked out my territory on your planet yet?
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Once you've marked out my territory with the <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style>,{A笑眯眯} I'll definitely move into my new home right on time, kula bata!
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: But for the residence registration, {A加油}shouldn't we talk to someone from <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style>? I'll leave that to you then!
info: NPC邀请-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里
